website_summaries.verdict: This is a thinner, lighter blanket than the average moving blanket, with a textured surface designed to deliver strength and protect your belongings while moving.
pros: More of a flat wrap than a cushion, these are great for wrapping items like mirrors, secured with rubber bands, tape, and shrink wrap
Good for dragging heavy items, too
cons: Can leave color/stain on white furniture
Some people report uneven uniformity of sizes

customer_reviews.title: Don't use on light furniture
customer_reviews.text: Plus: they did a great job protecting our furniture. Minus: the blue/grey tint on the blankets, bled all over all of our white furniture and it seems like they are ruined (white bed, dresser and light brown kitchen table).
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Hannah

customer_reviews.title: The blankets where fine though. Wrapped a tanning bed
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a 700 mile relocation charlotte to Kissimmee. Was a little worried when the package showed up just plastic and it was torn already. The blankets where fine though. Wrapped a tanning bed, armoire, washer dryer and dresser with these. Didnt so much for dust and dirt but no scarring or scratches on furniture. Kinda drug these across the back of the moving truck with the tanning bed on them and they held sturdy. Washed well , no shrinking or excessive shedding. Recommended to all my family for their moves or just when storing things.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick and durable blankets protect your belongings
customer_reviews.text: We were planning to move our entire household across states and were looking for durable and reasonable moving blankets. The reviews for the Textile Moving Blankets were positive, so we took a chance and purchased several units of these. We were not disappointed with the quality and thickness of these blankets. We also purchased quilted blankets, but for the price, we believe these are much better value and the next time would only purchase these. PROS: - Thick and durable - More reasonable in price than quilted blankets CONS: - none
customer_reviews.author: JustMyTwoCents

customer_reviews.title: Great and Cheaper than buying from U-haul
customer_reviews.text: These blankets worked great for moving. I've always had quilted moving blankets for local moves. But moving cross country meant i couldn't borrow them. These were cheaper than buying them from U-Haul and worked wonderfully with thethat i used to secure them to the furniture
customer_reviews.author: Freytag

customer_reviews.title: Super Thin and Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. I’ve bought these for a while for use in cage liners and they’ve been great. The last box I ordered was different though. They’re much thinner than they were before, and they feel like they’re going to fall apart. They’re not even the same color as they were. They were blue/grey like in the photo and now they are purple/grey. Really disappointed to see such a drop in quality, especially after a $10 price increase. When I first purchased these a few months ago they were $32 and some change and now they’re $41 and some change. So, worse quality for more money. I’ll be looking for moving pads from another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Smith

customer_reviews.title: They also served as good dragging blankets when moving heavy items
customer_reviews.text: These blankets did the job of protecting my delicates when I moved. They also served as good dragging blankets when moving heavy items, get the item on the blanket and then drag. Maybe I should be ashamed to say before unpacking I've even used a couple to sleep under on the bed. They shed a bit on your sheets when used this way but because I was warm I didn't mind. I highly recommend these blankets.
customer_reviews.author: I Heart Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I used these, in combination with shrink wrap and giant rubber bands, during a move and they all worked great at protecting my stuff. My only complaint is that the material is pretty easy to destroy with tape, and I think they may even fall apart if they get too wet. Nothing major by any means, but something to keep in mind. Overall, I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Thick and nice for padding
customer_reviews.text: I use these as a middle piece for my rat cage liners I make (pictured... they’re under fleece). It is absorbent and has a good thickness to it. I used several to move and they work for that too! Only thing is, they need to be washed several times to get dies and excess lint and fibers off before using for absorption. Great product for the price. Wish they were cut more even though.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great value/performance for protecting furniture during a move
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect after reading the reviews, but I was pleasantly surprised! There was no odor at all and the blankets were thicker than I expected. They provided good cushioning and protection for our furniture during our move and did not mar or transfer color to the surfaces. They were large enough that one could fully cover chairs or nightstands, but plan on 2-3 for dressors or large tables. They held up very well with no fraying or tears. I can probably get several more uses from them. Would highly recommend for moving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Costs the same as renting, and you get to keep them.
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were a little bigger... but for a twelve pack the price is very good. You could spend the same amount of money just renting them from U-Haul. UBOXES suggests that these are suitable only for one-time moves but they seem like they'd last at least a little longer than that. I don't know what they're like year and and year out but they are durable enough to attempt reuse.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: For outdoor dogs
customer_reviews.text: use these for my outdoor dogs ( even though they have insulated doghouses and hound heaters in dog houses ) , put several on the floors so they could burrow and even wrapped them around the outside of the doghouse for extra insulation . Cut slits in the door areas for them to come in and out and break up the wind . They aren't as thick as I thought but work very well and are easy to cut with a razor blade if you need smaller sizes . Will prob buy more
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I am reminded of the tabasco sauce commercial I used that... on everything I packed
customer_reviews.text: I packed up mirrors, desks, tables, TVs,.. everything when i moved with these blankets and then wrapped with plastic to hold them in place. They were thick and soft. I didn't worry about scratches and they are big enough to be effective without being so big you have lots of excess. There are so many in this package I didn't feel like I left any of my fragile or scratch able items exposed. I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended: many shortcomings
customer_reviews.text: These have a lot of short comings: -Thin, sometimes so thin that light pass through them. -Foreign material: some tin thread and grease soaked cotton. Don't use on cloth or porous material unless sealed. -Uneven size -Small: one blanket will only cover a chair. It will take several for a table, bookcase or dresser. -Inconsistent size and thickness. -Expensive for what you get. On the positive, -they are easy to cut into smaller sections.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Like many others we decided to move ourselves with the help of some supplies from Amazon. I wanted to be able to insulate furniture and then wrap it before putting it into the moving truck and these blankets are perfect! For the price they can't be beat and I would highly recommend. They are way nicer than the garbage blankets found in a rental moving truck.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but thinner than expected
customer_reviews.text: I received the blankets quickly (Thanks Amazon Prime!). Unfortunately, the first blanket I took out of the pack had 2 big holes in it! I checked the others and it appears this was the only faulty one in the pack. It's about the length of a standard door frame and about 8 to 10 inches wider than the standard door frame. They're also thinner than I expected. This shouldn't be a problem for me, since I bought the 12 pack. I'll just double up when I cover my furniture. For example, I'm using the blankets to cover my sofa (90in ×36in) while it's in storage and I needed 5 of them to fully cover it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great price, exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help pad my dresser on a blue from Georgia to Arizona. They did a really good job. They were thicker than I thought they would be. They held up great and protected my dressers with no problem. The only negative that I could see would be the amount of lint that was left behind on the dressers. This wasn't a huge problem for me...I just used a duster and lint was gone! I did not have any issues with some tearing. So, I will be able to use these again for other purposes
customer_reviews.author: DBaker

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE. PAPER THIN. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME, REFUNDS WILL BE A B***H
customer_reviews.text: This product is TERRIBLE. I ordered these instead of my usual UHAUL brand pads due to convenience of Prime shipping and saving about $5. Next time I will definitely be buying the UHAUL brand pads. I never leave reviews but this product is so cheap that I had to! These pads couldn't keep anything safe/covered during a move! They are covered in glitter fibers and multicolored threads, the competitor pads are all gray recycled denim. So thin that my finger went through one of the blankets just trying to unfold it! Contacted amazon and was offered a return AFTER shipping back a HEAVY LARGE package and I would have to pay a restocking fee, NO THANKS.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Used for sound dampening
customer_reviews.text: We bought these moving blankets to help dampen the sound in the music room where our son's metal band rehearses. The room is in the middle of our home and well...metal band, you know? They work great! We covered all of the walls with them.
customer_reviews.author: sherri craig-evans

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Cushioning
customer_reviews.text: I bought these moving blankets to wrap some delicate terra cotta pots, and they're perfect. They cut easily to size without fraying and are soft and thick. I've also used them to go under Christmas tree stands on hardwood floors. They're super handy to have around. For less than $30, the amount of high-quality, re-usable cushioning fabric in the package is a stunning deal.
customer_reviews.author: LeeLou

customer_reviews.title: Expensive moving blanket alternative
customer_reviews.text: These are a great alternative to purchasing expensive moving blankets. They are quite large. (See the picture of the blanket hanging over a 6 foot door). I plan to use some just to wrap around speakers and other delicate items. For really delicate items, I bought shrink wrap. I'm going to cut the blanket to size and then shrink wrap over that.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy blankets
customer_reviews.text: When I first received these blankets, I only received 6 of them instead of 12. I called amazon customer service and two days later they sent me the whole order. These blankets appear to be good quality and a great value for your money. They do tend to shed some lint when you first use them, but other than that I have no complaints. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as thick as other companies but well made
customer_reviews.text: I have moved all over the Country and have had plenty of experience with moving supplies. These blankets seem to be made well and are durable but are not as thick as other companies I have used. If you’re using these to cover something that won’t have something else heavy placed on top of it, then these are great. If you’re placing something heavy on top of an item I would recommend using several of these or getting a different blanket that is thicker. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: Covered in mold
customer_reviews.text: I received these and 80% were COVERED in mold. The ones I could use were great but they're not worth it if they're going to make my furniture stink and moldy. Also the blue fibers ended up on everything including myself. They do the job but only if you get a great deal on them
customer_reviews.author: Abby Waser

customer_reviews.title: Considering equivalent blankets were many times more expensive I'm satisfied with my purchase and would recommend these to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Cheap moving blankets that did their job. They survived my move and padded my valuable items and now serve life as the occasional drop cloth. Considering equivalent blankets were many times more expensive I'm satisfied with my purchase and would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Nice Moving Blankets
customer_reviews.text: These blankets are fairly well made and they are much better than those el cheapo things that Uhaul sells. I wish I had ordered more of these for our recent move. Our stuff would have faired better. Some reviewers reported a smell from these blankets, but I only noticed it slightly and it was only when I opened up the new package. For sure, the smell went away in a short time - like 1 day. These are easy enough to fold up and save for later. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: wmuzeke

customer_reviews.title: Great blankets to prevent scratches
customer_reviews.text: I got these to prevent scratches when moving. They are somewhere around 1/4" thick, so it's important to note that they are not padding. They are to prevent items from sliding against each other and scratching. And they do that well.
customer_reviews.author: Terrillja

customer_reviews.title: Moving MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: We are moving cross country and moving blankets were a must to protect our furniture and appliances. Yes, we could rent them from the rental truck company but this set is such a better deal. The blankets are thick and will definitely get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: jp85

customer_reviews.title: Very nice packing blankets
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a move from one house to another. These are an excellent value for the price. The fold very nicely and will store in a small amount of space. I would highly recommend these in the future
customer_reviews.author: Jon Gietzen

customer_reviews.title: What I expected and happy about it.
customer_reviews.text: After about a month of use, I can honestly say I am very happy with these blankets. As a real estate agent, I am packing and unpacking my staging equipment, furniture, pictures and stuff constantly. One side is very soft, the other a little more coarse. To be expected considering the material. Very sturdy and durable. I expect many years of constant use out of these. All the quality at a good price and made in the USA (last I purchased). If you a reading this a year from now, you can be assured that there are no problems because I will report back if there are any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy blankets
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a pods move from California to Florida. They are heavier duty than the normal moving blankets & provide more cushion. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice moving pads for the price
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these moving pads, I hoped they would be thick enough to provide adequate protection to my furniture. I am very pleased with the quality of these pads. They provide good protection - not as good as thicker, more expensive pads, but more than adequate. They are just as thick, or maybe a bit thicker, than the U-Haul blue moving pads. Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell.
customer_reviews.text: They do have a weird smell to them. Even after multiple washing’s. I got them to use for fleece guinea pig cage liners. I’ve only been using them for a week for that purpose, so I don’t know how well they will hold up over time. But I have plenty of these blankets to make multiple double layered fleece liners and small area mats for the boys cage.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT !
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to move my daughter home from college. We could not rent them with the truck because of Covid. It turned out to be a better deal to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: SD70

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my recent move and have to say that they are better quality and had better thickness than i expected, we had zero damage and zero breakages to anything we moved, I would buy these again in a heartbeat (but hopefully won't need them again anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dean waters

customer_reviews.title: Great price and glad to have so many
customer_reviews.text: Thought these were a good price for the quality. They worked great for our uhaul move to wrap and protect from rubbing against each other. Glad we had so many even though it was just a little two bedroom move!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great for moving!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used these in my move and they were easy to use. I also used shrink wrap for my furniture pieces and it helped tremendously with protecting my things. I wish they could have been thicker but they did the job nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: MsPeachesG

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy blanket at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to donate to a group that helps people living on the street; they are heavy enough and repellent enough to help with warmth for those living outdoors or substandard housing. And the price is right compared to alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: perlee123

customer_reviews.title: Solid moving blankets at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I used these for moving, ended up reordering additional bundles. The blankets worked well protecting my furniture during a PODS move. This was the best price I could find and the blankets are reusable for the next move.
customer_reviews.author: KentE

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: We used these to protect small furniture items for a six hundred mile move. They are fairly thin, as one might expect for such a reasonable cost, but they did an excellent job when used in conjunction with bubble wrap and shrink wrap to keep everything safe. The ability to cut to size for exceptionally small items allowed us to wrap several more pieces than we anticipated — bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Daynia

customer_reviews.title: Great blankets
customer_reviews.text: The guys that helped me move really liked the blankets. They said that they wanted them, when I was done. A few asked where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: FB Illa

customer_reviews.title: Great for lowering U value of exposed metal of Cargo Van
customer_reviews.text: Easy to work with 3M 94 for covering metal. Best cut with fresh razor blades. Also deadens the "drum" sound of the interior of a cargo van and protects the metal from scrapes from cargo and visa versa.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 12-pack as advertised and I received 6 blankets. They appear to be good quality. I just wish I had the other 6!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: These are great. They look like the underlayment pads for carpet
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They look like the underlayment pads for carpet, like different types of fibers woven together. But they really serve the purpose of protecting stuff in a move very well. Would highly recommend. The clearly won't last as long as real moving blankets. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: cardton

customer_reviews.title: Decent but bad smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell of gas maybe was on them they gave me slight headaches. So I waited to use at the last minute. Got the job down. Good price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, soft, big and more than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how soft these were. I also was pleasantly surprsied at the size. I had expected something much smaller than a typical moving blanket. I cut a couple of them up to wrap lamps, and other odd shaped items for a cross country move. I used them on all my more vulnerable items. I will buy them again if I have a need.
customer_reviews.author: inxs4

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I received these pads. They are a much better quality than I expected for the price. They worked perfectly for my move.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for our move...for about what it would have cost to rent from U-Haul, I own these blankets. Haven't found a second use for them yet but I'm sure they'll come in handy at some point or I'll pass them on to a friend who needs them. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Swerve784

customer_reviews.title: Good quality moving blankets at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality moving blankets at a good price. We needed to move some items from my parents house when it was sold and bough these. Definitely better quality that I expected for the price. Really don't need them anymore but can't see throwing them away while they are in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Betker

customer_reviews.title: These are just like UHaul’s pads
customer_reviews.text: These are just like UHaul’s pads at about 1/3 the price. I ordered six dozen and ran out, I knew I should have ordered more than I thought I would need.
customer_reviews.author: xyz

customer_reviews.title: moving blankets worked well
customer_reviews.text: the moving blankets worked very well! nothing was damaged in the move. it protected everything we needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett Butler

customer_reviews.title: need them
customer_reviews.text: For us these and the heavy duty ones were great and used each equally on each trip. Worked great
customer_reviews.author: edmocon

customer_reviews.title: Just the ticket for a local move
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for a local move, but they are not as sturdy as ones I've used for cross country moves. And they are MUCH cheaper than the flimsy blankets some packing/moving companies try to sell you. Just buy these and tell them "no thanks!" They are also great if you intend to store items which you want to protect, not to mention they make a great picnic blanket or cargo protector. I keep one or two in the car. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: VMHill

customer_reviews.title: Good Pads
customer_reviews.text: These moving pads work great. For the price they can’t be beat. This is the second set I have bought. They can be reused multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Benefield

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moving blankets
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfect. If you need some moving blankets I would recommend these. They are plenty thick enough to avoid damage to what it is protecting, but not so thick that they are difficult to work with. They slide around easily on solid surfaces such as hardwood and laminate. They also work well for protecting from debris in a work area. They fold and shake off easily. I'm happy with them and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: V Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight packing blanket
customer_reviews.text: These were great for general packing when loading my trailer for a move. After the move, they will get a second life as emergency blankets to keep in cars and trucks. Definitely a good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: John Scott

customer_reviews.title: Useful and priced well for light padding of items.
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. They are very well priced, and as they are a bit smaller, they are functional for packing smaller items or just padding between items. They're a good substitute for bubble wrap, if you neglected to bring some. On the other hand (and this probably only matters to a very few buyers) using these will leave you COVERED in lint. So you have plans after packing your truck, you may want to bring a lint brush. Otherwise very useful and priced well.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of hydration

customer_reviews.title: Good product but didnt receive full order
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of the 12 pack moving blankets. When i received the packages i thought each package had 12 blankets each. I was wrong i only received 6 blankets in each box. I am missing 12 blankets but paid for 24. I hope they fix this issue.
customer_reviews.author: George Maki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, tough moving blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Not as thick as I expected, but definitely tough and sturdy. Used to block sound in recording studio.
customer_reviews.author: JackalSwitch

customer_reviews.title: Good quality moving blankets
customer_reviews.text: These blankets worked out perfectly for our move. They were inexpensive enough that we bought plenty and they were exactly what we wanted. They are higher quality than we expected and we can definitely reuse them!
customer_reviews.author: SLE

customer_reviews.title: Great for Moving!
customer_reviews.text: These are really helpful for moving. They held up pretty well too, so we've been using them for additional needs.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These were a great price and shipped quickly. We used them in our storage POD when we put our furniture in there. It saved us the cost of having to rent or buy them from the moving company.
customer_reviews.author: MEP2014

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Made the move so much easier - wrapped glass table tops, large framed pictures, flat screen, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn O.

customer_reviews.title: Thick moving blankets cheap
customer_reviews.text: Thick blankets, easy to work with. They are on the stiff side, but great for protecting furnishing during a move. My only complaint is that they tend to throw off a lot of dust on first use.
customer_reviews.author: godospoons

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: These are a little thicker than a high quality wool blanket. If you are padding smooth surface to smooth surface they will be great. They don't fall apart, but I would not expect them to hold up to more than a few moves before showing wear. I have read other reviews that mentioned a smell, but the ones I got had no smell at all. They are what they say they are and do what they say they will do.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality blankets.  Come in a 12 pack wrapped in plastic.
customer_reviews.text: 12 pack of blankets. Not thin cheap ones. They are large too 54 (4.5 feet) x 72 (6 feet). Use them to wrap items for a household move or keep a couple in each of your vehicles during the winter for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: MikeF

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: Okay moving blankets, better than other more expensive blankets I purchased on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works ok...once
customer_reviews.text: Some of them came already "stressed" in certain areas (meaning they were transparent) but overall they worked for what I needed them to do. They do not look like they are reusable over several applications or moves.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ballister

customer_reviews.title: Worked fantastic for moving and wrapping glass shelves, no smell, good thickness!
customer_reviews.text: I needed these to wrap glass shelves from my entertainment centers for moving. They are GREAT. Thick enough and no smell, as some other moving blankets' reviews state. I think there might have been some color transfer (blue) to my hands after a lot of handling, but nothing significant. These worked amazingly well for wrapping my glass shelves and I am saving them for use for any future moves. Great value and great product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for moving
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our move. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Smelled of mold and blankets damp when arrived
customer_reviews.text: Showed up with damaged bag inside box, which I know that isn’t always the manufacturers problem, but when they arrived they smelt horribly. As if they had been sitting in a hot damp location. Very moldy smelling. Would not purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: They smell so bad I couldn’t even keep them in the house
customer_reviews.text: They smell of mold and mildew. I tried to bleach a couple to get the smell out but even that didn’t help. Ok for moving equipment I guess but there is no way I would use them on my furniture. They smell so bad I couldn’t even keep them in the house. In had to put them in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful moving pads
customer_reviews.text: Great moving pads. High quality. Smaller than uhaul pads but great for smaller furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: They got the job done and held up very well
customer_reviews.author: CLINTON KETTLE

customer_reviews.title: Great value I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: For the money these are exactly what I need and they are not your heavy duty moving blanket but they certainly get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Chuck McKibbin

customer_reviews.title: Great value and protects home furnishings.
customer_reviews.text: These blankets were perfect for my move, covering furniture to store for a few months. Great value too!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Plantt

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: These things are thin and stinky. There are not the kind that movers use. For us, they were useless.I already threw them away and we moved last week.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D.

customer_reviews.title: as good as Uhaul blankets
customer_reviews.text: great savings over what the moving company or truck company wanted. washable and reusable for various purposes
customer_reviews.author: GoodBuyForLife

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: We use these for Guinea pigs it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Ruggles

customer_reviews.title: Moving blankets—great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These came in so handy! We wrapped up end tables, a desk, pictures...you name it...when we packed up my daughters house. However, I bought this pack of 12 for the price and because they would arrive in a timely manner. I originally ordered thicker more expensive ones, but they wouldn’t arrive in time.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Gingerella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for moving and exactly what I was looking for!! Great price too! After moving, they make excellent dog blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Lambchop

customer_reviews.title: Thin, but good
customer_reviews.text: Good, but thin. Not very hardy for moving, but it did help for scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Stroike

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these moving blankets. I'm actually using them for guinea pig bedding. I washed them first of course and then cut them to size. They stayed very soft. We'll see how they do through multiple washings but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Will keep purchasing as needed
customer_reviews.text: Have recommended to several people. Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal for this Pack of Blankets
customer_reviews.text: Quality blankets which will suit my need perfectly - to keep items from getting scratched during transit. Fantastic price!
customer_reviews.author: Terri T.

customer_reviews.title: Good but alternatives subbed in with no notice.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered three 12-packs for our upcoming move. This review isn't so much about the performance, although they look like they will do the job. Rather, two of the 12-packs were not what is pictured at all. I think they will be an adequate substitute and our move is too soon to pursue a replacement. If that matters to you, beware. If not, go for it. I am including pictures of what we got. The one in the white wrapper is what we received two of.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ozereko

customer_reviews.title: Thin, but tough
customer_reviews.text: These blankets were a good size. A little disappointed that they were so thin. We had to double them up in places on our antiques to pack them for shipping. These are probably 1/2 the material weight of the blankets that our professional movers use. Nonetheless, I would recommend as long as you add extra corner protection if using this for moving. These are ideal for storage, as they keep dust & dirt off nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kemyst

customer_reviews.title: Think 'FELT'.. that is the closest description that ...
customer_reviews.text: Think 'FELT' .. that is the closest description that I can think of which these blankets are made of. They're nicer than I expected them to be (considering the price) .. They are thin and pliable and have the ability to be 'wrapped around' a piece of furniture. I certainly will order these again. I am 'pleased.'
customer_reviews.author: E. G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moving blankets for the money.
customer_reviews.text: They smell a bit at first but just air them out before moving and they're fine. They also shed a lot so shake them out too. And they aren't particularly strong so don't think about washing and reusing. Ultimately though, the good value outweighs the few drawbacks, especially compared to the more expensive ones on Amazon or at Uhaul or your big box store.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a dog blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Yipes products so thin you could see through it practically. Wouldn’t exactly call damn moving blankets, more like moving washcloths.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Darling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly to protect and cushion items packed in a pod.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: These are great value. Thick and substantial so that all my ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great value. Thick and substantial so that all my furniture arrived safe and sound. They are so nice, in fact, I'm having trouble disposing of them now that my move is over. I'm finding some uses for them around the house and in the car but eventually will close my eyes and toss them in the dumpster. The important thing is that they did the job.
customer_reviews.author: sammydamm

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. You can see right through.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. So thin that you can see right through. Go with Sure- max 12 count 35lb.
customer_reviews.author: BladeRunner

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Get the job done, don’t believe they are made to last, very thin. May get one or two uses. Will be buying better quality next time.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Dedmon

customer_reviews.title: For the money I think they were worth it but they aren't super thick. I used these to cover my furniture ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these when we were moving cross country. For the money I think they were worth it but they aren't super thick. I used these to cover my furniture plus a lot of plastic wrap. And I can easily use them again. They didn't get damaged in our pods.
customer_reviews.author: Lily3222

customer_reviews.title: The did the job for a single move. Might ...
customer_reviews.text: The did the job for a single move. Might last 1-2 more moves, but definitely not any more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Sheds lint on furntiure
customer_reviews.text: These blanks are a pretty good thickness for padding, but they leave a lot of lint behind on fabric furniture.
customer_reviews.author: TreeSoul

customer_reviews.title: Great moving blankets for the money.
customer_reviews.text: They are durable yet light. Very sturdy and up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: Unstoppable Enterprises, LLC.

customer_reviews.title: worse moving blankets ever
customer_reviews.text: After we unwrapped our dining room table we found that the blankets were all stuck to the table. It ruined our $2000 table.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit the bill nicely
customer_reviews.text: Went online to order some quilted moving blankets and came across these. The price was right and they are strong and well made. I used them to move some family antiques and to put some antiques in long time storage. I wouldn't hesitate to buy more if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Used along with plastic wrap for moving. Worked great, saving for the next move!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M.

product_meta.title: uBoxes Moving Blankets - Textile Skins - (12 Pack) 54x72" Pads 1.66lbs Each
product_meta.description: Made of a soft yet durable quilted fabric, these textile blankets are spacious and are ideal for draping and wrapping a wide variety of furniture in your home. For example, you can spread out the 54-inch by 72-inch blanket across a coffee table, a couch, A kitchen table, and even a dining room Hutch. Because the blankets are made from a light fabric, you can squeeze and tuck the blanket ends and sides in corners of the furniture to secure the blanket to the furniture. Great choice for short term use and packing moving containers or rental trucks. Use rope or ratchet straps to secure textile moving blankets in place. The material is soft and durable to protect furniture from dents and scratches. Ensures the safety and Security of your furniture when wrapped properly. Protects larger items from bumping into each other and causing damages.
feature_bullets: Great choice for short term use and packing moving containers or rental trucks
Use rope or ratchet straps to secure textile moving blankets in place
The material is soft and durable to protect furniture from dents and scratches
Ensures the safety and security of your furniture when wrapped properly
Protects larger items from bumping into each other and causing damages
